summary: Fixed Railway health check issues by adding proper health check endpoints (/test, /, /api/health), updating railway.json configuration with correct healthcheckPath and timeout, improving server startup with 0.0.0.0 binding, and adding comprehensive error handling. All health check failures should now be resolved.
current_status: Railway deployment is now fully optimized with proper health check endpoints and server configuration. Application should start successfully and pass all health checks. Database auto-setup and application deployment ready for production use.
